name: CnetG Asia
description: CnetG Asia are a proud representative of Kestria, the world's largest alliance of boutique executive search firms in 'country'. Kestria's reach currently spans 40+ countries and 90+ cities and counting. What sets us apart is our shared entrepreneurial spirit and drive to deliver excellence in executive search. Wherever the location, whatever the industry, we provide you with consistent firstclass service. With globe-spanning connections and local knowledge you have a single point of contact for your international and local search requirements. We recognise that every search has differing requirements and tailor our approach to fit your needs. We've successfully completed 40,000+ searches for over 4,000 clients, serving everyone from game-changing start-ups to major global players. 50+ nationalities, 40+ languages spoken and 52% female-led businesses. This diversity enriches our awareness of cultural differences – and means we have every imaginable base covered with regards to industry, region and size of company.
features: We take pride in encouraging intellectual honesty, credibility and long-term relationships.
Our high-touch and multi-channel sourcing solutions combine talent acquisition with risk advisory so that you make the right choices.
Our success is measured by long retention rates and the success of our candidates in getting promotions within their organizations.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: AESC is a global professional association representing excellence in executive search and leadership advisory solutions.
ShortDescription: We are a proud representative of Kestria, the world's largest alliance of boutique executive search firms in 'country'.
enhanced_description: CnetG Asia is a proud representative of Kestria, the world's largest alliance of boutique executive search firms, with a global reach spanning 40+ countries and 90+ cities. They specialize in high-touch and multi-channel executive search and talent acquisition solutions, incorporating risk advisory to ensure optimal candidate placement and long-term success. With a track record of over 40,000 successful searches for more than 4,000 clients, CnetG Asia serves a diverse clientele, from game-changing start-ups to major global players. Their approach is highly tailored to individual search requirements, emphasizing intellectual honesty, credibility, and the development of long-term relationships. The firm boasts a diverse network, representing over 50 nationalities and 40 languages spoken, with 52% female-led businesses, which enhances their cultural awareness and market coverage. Their success is measured by high candidate retention rates and the career progression of candidates within their client organizations.
key_use_cases: Executive search for leadership and specialized roles
Sourcing high-quality talent with a focus on long-term retention and career progression
Building a diverse and inclusive workforce through talent placement
Mitigating risks in the talent acquisition process
competitive_advantages: Part of Kestria, the world's largest alliance of boutique executive search firms, offering extensive global reach and network
Combination of global connections with local market knowledge, providing a single point of contact for international and local search requirements
Integration of talent acquisition with risk advisory for informed decision-making
Tailored approach to fit unique search requirements
Success measured by long candidate retention rates and candidate promotions within organizations, indicating a focus on quality and long-term fit
Commitment to diversity, leveraging a diverse internal network and client base to enhance cultural awareness
roi_benefits: Improved talent retention rates within client organizations
Enhanced career progression and success for placed candidates
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Contribution to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce
Reduced risk in talent acquisition decisions through integrated advisory services
scalability_features: Ability to manage international and local search requirements across 40+ countries and 90+ cities through a global alliance
Capacity to serve a wide range of client sizes from start-ups to major global players
